metaData.label: Allow sending
metaData.criteriaDescription: UUID is not null  AND SUBSCRIPTION is True AND PHONE is False AND EMAIL is True AND ( ( FREQUENCY equal ANNUALLY AND LAST_COMMUNICATION is on or before Today Minus 1 Year ) OR ( FREQUENCY equal BIANNUAL AND LAST_COMMUNICATION is on or before Today Minus 6 Months ) OR ( FREQUENCY equal QUARTERLY AND LAST_COMMUNICATION is on or before Today Minus 3 Months ) OR ( FREQUENCY equal MONTHLY AND LAST_COMMUNICATION is on or before Today Minus 1 Month ) OR ( FREQUENCY equal BIWEEKLY AND LAST_COMMUNICATION is on or before Today Minus 15 days ) )

triggeredSend.preHeader: MSD Ärzte Panel: Ihre Meinung ist gefragt!
Kurze Umfrage zum Thema "Herausforderungen im Praxisalltag"
